root.Summary: 1: Harmalkar M, Upraity S, Kazi S, Shirsat NV. Tamoxifen-Induced Cell Death ofMalignant Glioma Cells Is Brought About by Oxidative-Stress-Mediated Alterations in the Expression of BCL2 Family Members and Is Enhanced on miR-21 Inhibition. J Mol Neurosci. 2015 Oct;57(2):197-202. doi: 10.1007/s12031-015-0602-x. Epub 2015Jun 25. PubMed PMID: 26109525.
